speaker: Christian Vance burger
title: Trove
description:
Trove is a new marketplace from Microsoft connecting AI/ML developers who can crowdsource licensed, high-quality data (photos) for training their Computer Vision AI projects from photo takers. We talk about the principles, ideas and mission behind Trove and share a demo on how Trove helps photo takers sell high quality photos for ML projects with transparency & privacy.
 
Jump To:
[02:20]  Principles, ideas and mission behind Trove
[07:13]  Demo
[12:29]  Closing & Call to action
